shape module¶

class shape.Shape(label=None, line_color=None)¶

Bases: object

This class represents an annotation bounding box and contains methods for altering them.

MOVE_VERTEX = 0¶
NEAR_VERTEX = 1¶
P_ROUND = 1¶
P_SQUARE = 0¶
addPoint(point)¶

Add a point to the shape. :param point: The point to add to the shape.

boundingRect()¶

Draws the bounding rectangle using the QPainterPath

close()¶

Close the shape after the user is done drawing it.

containsPoint(point)¶
Parameters:point – The point
Returns:Returns True if the shape contains the given point. False otherwise.
copy()¶

Copy this shape. :return: Return a copy of this shape.

drawVertex(path, i)¶

Draw the vertex of the shape. :param path: :param i:

fill_color = <PyQt5.QtGui.QColor object at 0x000002DB92A3FC88>¶
highlightClear()¶

Clear the highlighting.

highlightVertex(i, action)¶

Highlight a vertex using the given action (usually when the user mouses over it). :param i: The index of the vertex to move. :param action: The action to perform.

hvertex_fill_color = <PyQt5.QtGui.QColor object at 0x000002DB92A3FE48>¶
isClosed()¶
Returns:True if the shape is closed. False otherwise.
line_color = <PyQt5.QtGui.QColor object at 0x000002DB92A3FA58>¶
makePath()¶
Returns:The QPainterPath of the drawn shape.
moveBy(offset)¶

Move the shape by the given offset. :param offset: The number of pixels to move the shape.

moveVertexBy(i, offset)¶

Move the specified vertex with the given offset. :param i: The index of the vertex to move. :param offset: The number of pixels to move the vertex.

nearestVertex(point, epsilon)¶
Parameters:
  • point – The point to compare with all vertices.
  • epsilon – The epsilon value.
Returns:

Return the point that is nearest the the given point.
paint(painter)¶

Paint the shape using QPen and the given painter :param painter: The QPainter.

point_type = 1¶
popPoint()¶
Returns:The last value in the list of points.
reachMaxPoints()¶
Returns:True if there are at least 4 points in the shape. False otherwise.
